data.meta_description: Learn about Paessler PRTG network monitoring software for small businesses. Includes info on Paessler PRTG, pricing, and FAQs.
data.text:
Review:

Pros: Easy implementation process. Offers powerful features that are constantly improving.

Cons: When you use more than 5,000 sensors, you need to use 5-minute intervals or longer, instead of the usual 1-minute intervals.

Reputation: Solid option! Easy to set up with comprehensive features. However, the UI is not user-friendly.

How much does Paessler PRTG cost?

Paessler PRTG'S plans start at $1,799.00 per server license for the PRTG network monitoring range and $1,599.00 per year for the hosted monitoring solution. The company also offers monthly payment plans for the Hosted range, as well as an Enterprise plan that starts at $16,600.00 per year.
